what: Compendium of Triple J's Hottest 100 tracks
title: Compendium of Triple J's Hottest 100 tracks
text: goal hottest100 provide compendium Triple J hottest 100 songs. Data scraped Triple J’s best 100 Australian songs historic information Wikipedia. three data sets artists, tracks, polls.

title: Compendium of Triple J's Hottest 100 tracks
text: can install development version hottest100 GitHub :

title: Compendium of Triple J's Hottest 100 tracks
Compendium of Triple J's Hottest 100 tracks
text: Triple J Hottest 100 Track Data - dataset containing track-level data Triple J Hottest 100. data.frame one row per track, including variables: alltime: Logical; indicates entry -time chart specific year. artist: Character; name artist band associated withtrack. country: Character; country associated track/chart. id: Unique identifier track (within year) pollyear: Countdown poll year position: Chart position track. track: Title track song. releaseyear: Original release year track.
code: as_tibble(tracks) #> # A tibble: 4,200 × 8 #>    alltime artist           country   id    pollyear position releaseyear track  #>    <lgl>   <chr>            <chr>     <chr>    <int>    <int> <chr>       <chr>  #>  1 FALSE   Spiderbait       Australia 1         1996        1 1996        Buy M… #>  2 FALSE   Tool             USA       2         1996        2 1996        Stink… #>  3 FALSE   Ben Folds Five   USA       3         1996        3 1996        Under… #>  4 FALSE   Butthole Surfers USA       4         1996        4 1996        Pepper #>  5 FALSE   Bush             UK        5         1996        5 1996        Glyce… #>  6 FALSE   Powderfinger     Australia 6         1996        6 1996        Pick … #>  7 FALSE   The Prodigy      UK        7         1996        7 1996        Breat… #>  8 FALSE   Allen Ginsberg   USA       8         1996        8 1996        Balla… #>  9 FALSE   Weezer           USA       9         1996        9 1996        El Sc… #> 10 FALSE   311              USA       10        1996       11 1996        Down   #> # ℹ 4,190 more rows

title: Compendium of Triple J's Hottest 100 tracks
text: Triple J Hottest 100 Polls. dataset information Triple J Hottest 100 poll. data.frame one row per countdown, including variables: year: year poll held. alltime: Logical; whether poll “-Time” countdown alltimedescription: description poll, applicable. colorRGB: Primary RGB color value associated year character format. contrastColorRGB: Contrasting RGB color value (character format) suitable text overlay.
code: as_tibble(polls) #> # A tibble: 42 × 5 #>     year alltime alltimedescription    colorRGB      contrastColorRGB #>    <int> <lgl>   <chr>                 <chr>         <chr>            #>  1  2025 TRUE    "Of Australian Songs" 224, 49, 37   <NA>             #>  2  2024 FALSE   ""                    119, 38, 127  <NA>             #>  3  2023 FALSE   ""                    221, 121, 62  0, 0, 0          #>  4  2023 TRUE    "Like A Version"      46, 65, 79    <NA>             #>  5  2022 FALSE   ""                    248, 215, 189 0, 0, 0          #>  6  2021 FALSE   ""                    0, 135, 0     <NA>             #>  7  2020 FALSE   ""                    239, 43, 204  0, 0, 0          #>  8  2020 TRUE    "Of The Decade"       16, 32, 92    <NA>             #>  9  2019 FALSE   ""                    244, 171, 68  0, 0, 0          #> 10  2018 FALSE   ""                    181, 204, 62  0, 0, 0          #> # ℹ 32 more rows

title: Compendium of Triple J's Hottest 100 tracks
text: Triple J Hottest 100 Artists. deduplicated dataset artists represented Triple J Hottest 100, created tracks. artist: Artist name country: Country origin releaseyear: Release year included track
code: as_tibble(artists) #> # A tibble: 2,729 × 3 #>    artist           country   releaseyear #>    <chr>            <chr>     <chr>       #>  1 Spiderbait       Australia 1996        #>  2 Tool             USA       1996        #>  3 Ben Folds Five   USA       1996        #>  4 Butthole Surfers USA       1996        #>  5 Bush             UK        1996        #>  6 Powderfinger     Australia 1996        #>  7 The Prodigy      UK        1996        #>  8 Allen Ginsberg   USA       1996        #>  9 Weezer           USA       1996        #> 10 311              USA       1996        #> # ℹ 2,719 more rows

title: Triple J Hottest 100 Artists — artists
text: deduplicated dataset artists represented Triple J Hottest 100,   created tracks.

title: Triple J Hottest 100 Artists — artists
Triple J Hottest 100 Artists — artists
text: data.frame one row per artist, including variables: artist Artist name country Country origin releaseyear Release year included track

title: Get the facts — get_factd
Get the facts — get_factd
code: get_factd() #> Powderfinger has the most top 10 entries in the yearly countdowns. They have appeared 9 times!

text: data.frame one row per countdown, including variables : year year poll held. alltime Logical; whether poll "-Time" countdown alltimedescription description poll, applicable. colorRGB Primary RGB color value associated year     character format. contrastColorRGB Contrasting RGB color value (character format)     suitable text overlay.

title: Triple J Hottest 100 Track Data — tracks
Triple J Hottest 100 Track Data — tracks
text: data.frame one row per track, including variables : alltime Logical; indicates entry -time chart     specific year. artist Character; name artist band associated     track. country Character; country associated track/chart. id Unique identifier track (within year) pollyear Countdown poll year position Chart position track. releaseyear Original release year track. track Title track song.

what: Find the best in any year — who_is_the_hottest
title: Find the best in any year — who_is_the_hottest
text: function help searching information year

title: Find the best in any year — who_is_the_hottest
Find the best in any year — who_is_the_hottest
text: year integer, pollyear search `tracks` data. special logical, whether include `alltime` data. Default include .

title: Find the best in any year — who_is_the_hottest
code: who_is_the_hottest(2023) #> In 2023, Doja Cat was the hottest!
